description: Alex Lockwood's post gives an in-depth analysis of shared element transitions and their role in the Activity and Fragment Transitions API. This is the third of a series of posts he's written on the topic.
title: Shared Element Transitions In-Depth (part 3a)

description: Here's a deep look at Java annotation processors by Hannes Dorfmadd, including making them work with Android build processes.
title: Annotation Processing 101

description: Fernando Cejas shares some RxJava insights regarding transforming your stream.
title: RxJava Observable tranformation: concatMap() vs flatMap()

description: The focus for version 1.1 is bug fixes. However, in addition to the bug fixes there are some notable improvements, including mipmap resources on new projects, new lint checks and new templates for creating watch faces.
title: Android Studio 1.1 Preview 1 Released

description: In this article Mark Allison takes the VectorDrawable animations a step further and looks at how to actually animate the contents of the path elements.
title: VectorDrawables – Part 3

description: Riyaz Ahamed was working on redesigning an android app. In this post he describes all the thought process involved in redesigning a particular screen.
title: Replacing an Icon

description: Fyza Hashim describes how she and the rest of the Trello team gave their Android app a Material design makeover.
title: We are Living in a Material World and I am a Material Girl

description: In this second tutorial, Taylor Ling shares his experiences in applying easing into the Material UI animations made with Photoshop.
title: UI Animation in Photoshop – Tutorial #2

description: Mobile ticketing right now is where photo sharing was five years ago (i.e. awful). We're changing that. We’ve come a long way already, but we still have so much more we want to do! Join our team and help us build an Android app that defines sports and music on the platform.
title: Android Developer

description: Trello is looking for brilliant developers to help us make our Android app even more awesome. Trello for Android is fully native, minSdkVersion is 15, and we are an Editors' Choice. If you're a RxJava addict with experience making highly interactive applications, come join us!
title: Android Developer

description: If you are: green, approx. 0.53 meters tall and feed upon well-crafted code (or all of the above at least at heart) then we need you!
title: Android Developer

description: Guidebook offers a platform that makes it easy to create mobile apps for events and places!
title: Android Developer

description: Notion is a mobile startup looking to hire an experienced Android developer. You will be joining a small and ambitious team who's goal is to change the face of messaging.
title: Android Engineer

description: You will be a technical lead and mentor. You will guide project teams by creating technical designs, writing user stories, and grooming the backlog. You will promote and champion best technical practices with both our clients and the development team. AND, you get to code!
title: Senior Android Engineer

description: As Engineering Manager for Mutual Mobile’s Android department, you will be a key player in the definition and execution of company goals. You will define strategies to grow and strengthen the Android team, and be a leader in the development of software projects on the Android platform.
title: Engineering Manager, Android

description: Etsy is set on redefining what mobile, person-to-person commerce means for the entire world. We’re a mobile first company that is focused on scaling Android and iOS app development throughout our whole organization. 2015 is going to be a huge year for apps at Etsy. Want to be a part of it?
title: Software Engineer, Android @ Etsy

description: A plugin to generate the Android version code and version name automatically.
title: Gradle Advanced Build Version Plugin

description: MaterialRangeBar is a fork of https://github.com/edmodo/range-bar that adds some basic material styling, as well as start and end values, values as floats and some other things.
title: MaterialRangeBar

description: A simple library to add some effect to screen title.
title: Android Indicators

description: Interactive paging indicator widget, compatible with the ViewPager from the Android Support Library.
title: Android PagerSlidingTabStrip

description: A nicely animated side navigation menu
title: Side-Menu.Android

description: Jake Wharton has released and open sourced Telecine, a small app which he wrote two months ago for creating clean screen recordings directly on your device.
title: Telecine

description: Marc Prengemann just released hist first plugin called Android Drawable Importer for Android Studio and IntelliJ which makes importing of images easier.
title: Android Drawable Importer

description: Mike Wallace shares a script to add to your gradle build to help keep your app signing keystore safe and backed up.
title: A script to safely manage your Android keystore

description: This talk starts with a brief introduction to Dagger and dependency injection in general and then covers the new concepts and new APIs provided by Dagger v2 with real-world examples.
title: The Future of Dependency Injection with Dagger 2
